chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML
chunks.text: In this video, I will tell you about ID and classes.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML
chunks.text: The concept of ID and classes is one of the most confusing concepts.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML
chunks.text: In fact, when I was learning HTML in my early days, I was very confused in ID and classes.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML
chunks.text: ID means unique identifier.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML
chunks.text: If you give an ID to an element, then you will not give that ID to the other element.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML
chunks.text: But class means that if you want to give multiple elements, then you will give it multiple classes.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML
chunks.text: For example, you can give a class named red to a div and a form.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML
chunks.text: Similarly, you can give a class named BG red to an article tag and a header tag.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML
chunks.text: Please like this video because we will now go to the computer screen and see these things very closely.
